title: Double it and give to the next Person

data.title: Double it and give to the next Person
data.statement: You are filming a video where you will offer money to a stranger. They can take it or double it and give it to the next person. But you are given a budget that can't be exceeded and you need to find out how many times it can be doubled

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are filming a video where you will offer money to a stranger. They can take it or double it and give it to the next person. But you are given a budget that can't be exceeded and you need to find out how many times it can be doubled
Input
Line 1 an integer startValue,How Much you will Offer to begin with
Line 2 an integer budget,How Much you can spend
Output
an integer How many times it can be doubled
Constraints
0<startValue<100000
startValue≤budget < 1000000000
Example
Input
1
64
Output
6
